meanings.definition: Of or relating to the yolk of an egg.
meanings.sent1: The vitellines part of the egg is yellow.
meanings.sent2: The chef used a vitellines ingredient in the omelette.
meanings.sent3: The vitellines color of the yolk made the egg look sunny-side up.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the vitellines yolk of a fresh egg.
meanings.sent5: The vitellines essence of the yolk gave the cake a rich flavor.

meanings.definition: A substance found in the yolk of an egg.
meanings.sent1: The vitellines in the yolk provide nutrients.
meanings.sent2: She separated the vitellines from the egg white.
meanings.sent3: The vitellines in the yolk were like little drops of sunshine.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as the vitellines in the yolk.
meanings.sent5: The vitellines added richness to the custard dessert.
